key_risks: Underwriting profitability challenges due to rising claims costs and catastrophic events
Exposure to increasing climate-related risks and natural disasters
Regulatory challenges in a heavily regulated industry
High market competition in the P&C insurance sector
Fluctuating short interest and mixed investor sentiment
controversies: Volatile claims environment impacting financial stability
Dependence on reinsurance agreements introducing counterparty risk
environmental_issues: Exposure to climate-related risks and natural disasters
governance_issues: Need for ongoing investment in underwriting and catastrophe risk management
